ModMetaData.name: MH: Industrial Automatons
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7xuCZqW.png[/img] [h1]Submod for the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974524016]Mechanical Humanlikes[/url] family of mods.[/h1] Designed for Rimworld 1.4 Mod Version V1.0 Please consider rating this if you like it! It really helps out. [img]https://i.imgur.com/tE28cZ7.gif[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/kbYsPSO.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/6KqTKks.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table] *Use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2921585989]Mid-saver Saver[/url] to add safely due to the changes to certain biomimetic defs which may cause issues in some saves. *You can attempt to clean your save and remove with Mid-saver Saver but it is strongly not recommended.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/6o9HyTD.png[/img] This mod reworks and expands upon features designed to be used or best operated with T1 and other biomimetic drones. The most efficient way to produce the things in this mod is definitely by either using biomimetic drones, or having lots of grunt workers on hand.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Wh5EspM.png[/img] [h1]Features:[/h1] [b]Complete re-layout of the tech tree to highlight synergistic upgrades for drones[/b] [b]Continuous Tread Leg [/b] - Zippy speeds! Only for droids who do field work and never need to go near combat... - Recommended for T1's [b]Mechanical Production Chains[/b] - Product Refinement Table for handling recipes - Metallic textiles from Steel and Plasteel - Synthread production - Mechanite harvesting for ways to eventually produce Luciferium and Hyperweave...
[img]https://i.imgur.com/yNMq01g.png[/img] [b]Future Fun:[/b] - Recharge Throne --- A chair for unfeeling cooks to charge and cook at the same time! (Hideously uncomfortable...) - Clankity Joints --- Replacement joints with their own processors. --- Will cause droids to automatically adopt rakish spacecowboy poses and lounge indolently on couches. --- Mildly amusing for your other pawns. Warning; may make T1's appear to have personality.
[b]Other Future Planned Stuff:[/b] - Spacer tech production mimetics - Android work gear - More legs, arms, etc.
I am happy to incorporate other ideas if people have them.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Qp8JBtZ.png[/img] [h1]Recommended:[/h1] [list] [*]Works best with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2933248825]ATR Frames Reforged[/url]! [*]Works best with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2962634958]ATR MUFF Reforged[/url]! [*]Built-in synergistic integration with VGP Garden Fabrics [/list]
[h1]Compatibility:[/h1] [list] [*]Incompatible with [sd] Luciferium Production (Continued) (and the original) [/list]
[u]The following mods are special cases:[/u] *EdB Prepare Carefully eventually breaks all custom pawns; but that's their problem. *Combat Extended does their own compatibility patches; this [i]should[/i] be fine if they're patched for ATR.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/lQRf9dG.png[/img] [b]Can this be patched to work with -insert mod-?[/b] [i]If you make a patch, I'll happily add it in. I may make patches if they're easy, but I won't be doing any messy patches myself though.[/i]
[b]Will you add the other localisations for other languages?[/b] [i]As above, if you would like to provide a localisation, I'll happily add it in.[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/UN80Om5.png[/img] [h1]Assets and Support[/h1] [list] [*]Steel wool graphic resurrected from the original AT mod. [*]Mlie for resurrecting the Luciferium Production mod and licensing it so it could be integrated. [*]Thermo for the design of the Mechanical Product Refinement Table. [*]Greensniperhat for the Mechanical Product Refinement Table's actual artwork in-game. [/list]
[h1]Language Translations[/h1] [list] [*]Russian language translation provided by Tkhakiro [*]German (as much brought over from [sd] Luciferium Production as possible) [*]Spanish (as much brought over from [sd] Luciferium Production as possible) [*]SpanishLatin (as much brought over from [sd] Luciferium Production as possible) [/list] All translations are provided by the community in a voluntary capacity - I don't do them myself. Translations are not guaranteed to be up-to-date or to have errors fixed promptly. [h3]Want to submit a translation to your own language?[/h3] Go to the GitHub (linked below) and submit a pull request. Please look in the About folder for MissingTranslations.txt for an inventory of all translation gaps.
[h1]Links[/h1] The Repo for this mod can be found here: [url=https://github.com/MasterOfGrey/ATR-Industrial-Automatons/tree/Legacy-ATR]GitHub[/url] I hang out in the discord for the main Android Tiers Reforged mod: [url=https://discord.gg/udNCpbkABT]Discord[/url]
